blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester

summary: Do you think that if Dan and Phil "became" a thing on YT not ten years ago, but like, idk, three, people would still be so crazy...
question: Do you think that if Dan and Phil "became" a thing on YT not ten years ago, but like, idk, three, people would still be so crazy about their relationship and sexuality?
answer:
I honestly don’t know. It’s hard to say. Because how different would Dan and Phil be as people if they’d only met each other for the first time like, 3 years ago and started making YouTube videos together? It’s that butterfly effect. I feel like, if Dan and Phil’s relevance was more recent, I don’t think they’d allow so much speculation. At a certain point, they did sort of make a turn where they stopped trying to clear things up and just allowed the phannies to think whatever they wanted. I don’t think they’d do that if they’d been a little older.

It’s just really hard to say. Dan and Phil are the way they are because things happened the way they did. So it’s impossible to tell how things would be different if it had all started more recently.

summary: i don’t know if there’s a way to describe my emotions towards phil’s insta story. there’s just something about those polaroids...
body: i don’t know if there’s a way to describe my emotions towards phil’s insta story. there’s just something about those polaroids that fills me with this warm, joyful feeling i don’t know if i’ve felt towards dan and phil since the hiatus. it seems like those pictures should be taken as a montage in a cheesy movie, and the song ends on that shot of all of them. there’s really no other way to describe it. they just look so….happy. it’s like it filled in any doubt i may have that they’re not okay because of the hiatus, and seeing them so happy was just…indescribable. i’m so glad they’re so happy, and i kinda just felt the need to express that. hiatus or no hiatus, dnp are happy and i’m here for that.

summary:
hello idk if anyone talked about this before but: 
i‘m rewatching the sims series and in the episode „dils birthday in the big...
body:
hello idk if anyone talked about this before but:

i‘m rewatching the sims series and in the episode „dils birthday in the big city“ where they promote the gaming channel merch and stuff, they point out that they won’t age up dil bc the next stage would be elder.

and dan immediately jumped in and said „next year. wh-..“ and he hesitated and said „how long does he have?“

not to be saying it sounds like they planned ending the gaming channel at the end of 2018 in 2017 already but… u know… do what you want with that information….

summary: I've been out of the loop on dan and Phil for ages and im just reading this blog lmaoo. do they still live together ?
question: I've been out of the loop on dan and Phil for ages and im just reading this blog lmaoo. do they still live together ?
answer: Allegedly. There’s been some (mostly baseless) rumour that they may not live together anymore but I’m not totally convinced.

summary: When I first joined the Phandom:
body:

Me: *sees Dan* Marry me.

Me: *sees Phil* Marry me.


Me now:

summary: broken jar
title: broken jar
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2VKE9hW

by yikesola

Phil’s usually far too anxious to mess around with sex on a bad day. He knows; they’ve tried. But Phil thinks, while standing in the kitchen and still feeling the sparks on his skin where Dan had just been so tender and so doting, maybe it’s actually what he needs today.
A fic about anxious days and attention.

  • Rating: Explicit

  • Categories: M/M

  • Additional Tags: 2019, Anxiety, Smut
